title: Premiere: Novel Nature – Indigo
body:
This latest track from Seattle duo **Novel Nature** pulses with a ferocious energy to it.

Managing to merge honest, raw songwriting with the sort of stadium-yearning ambition that few bands are able to contain, Indigo is a real fists to the sky, anthemic moment. Lifted from a forthcoming EP, released as a follow-up to their 2014 debut, Nylon Nation, it’s a strikingly signal of intent from the two piece. Check it out below.
